mdRecord.dcterms:title: A survey of the Northern Neck of Virginia: being the lands belonging to the Rt. Honourable Thomas Lord Fairfax Baron Cameron, bounded by & within the Bay of Chesapoyocke and between the Rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack : with the courses of the Rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack, in Virginia, as surveyed according to order in the years 1736 & 1737
Courses of the Rivers Rappahannock and Potowmack, in Virginia, as surveyed according to Order in the Years 1736 & 1737
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Warner, John, fl. 1727-1741
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Litho. Photographic Inst. 492, New Oxford Street
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stephenson and McKee attribute the 1747 (larger) issue map to John Warner.
A Scale of Miles 69 1/2 in one Degree of Latitude.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Area Table 75-2 1747 Warner 1852: Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection.
